summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5636 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 1, H. S. Turner Park Addition, being the alley between East Boston Street and East Lynn Street, from 24th Avenue North to 25th Avenue North; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 74350, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
